patch.data: Environment
The Dawngate map is no longer SpoOooOooOoOky.
Balance and Tuning
Shapers

• Thrilling Heroics (Q)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been reduced to 9/8.5/8/7.5/7, down from 11/10/9/8/7.

• Pure Shaper - Chastise (Passive)
    • The percent damage per Fool's Fire Shade has been reduced to 3%, down from 4%.
    • The percent damage on Rebuke, Consecrate and Invocation has been reduced to 6%, down from 8%.
    • The Power ratio of this passive has been reduced to 4% per 100 Power, down from 5% per 100 Power.
  • Fool's Fire (Q)
    • The range of this ability has been reduced to 650, down from 700.

• Wisdom's Reach (R)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been reduced to 130/120/110, down from 150/130/110.

• Bolt (Q)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been reduced to 6/5/4/3/2, down from 7/6/5/4/3.
    • The Basic Attack Bonus has been increased to 25/30/35/40/45%, up from 20/25/30/35/40%.

• Damnation(R)
    • The lifedrain granted by this ability has been changed to 30/45/60% from 25/50/75%.

"Melee Tacticians always felt disadvantaged by how disproportionately difficult it was for them to take advantage of the role's harass bonus. This change is aimed at allowing the natural combos that melee shapers have in their kit both feel and be appropriately rewarding."
Tactician

• Melee attacks and abilities are now on a separate cooldown from ranged attacks and abilities.
  • The amount of Vim rewarded for a melee proc has been reduced to 20, down from 40.

"The price of most items have been updated to provide early, mid, and late game options per tier while still providing a degree of normalization in order to help make it easier to know if a player should return to base to buy or not. Additionally, the price per point of Haste has been increased due to Haste slightly over-performing across the board. Most items with Haste have either had their price increased, or their amount of Haste slightly reduced."

• The Health Regeneration granted by this item has been reduced to 5, down from 10.

    • AoE and DoT: Increased to 10%, up from 7.5%.

  • This item now has the Brilliance passive.
  • This item now builds out of Inspiration.
  • The Netherbind passive has been redesigned. It now does the following: "Basic attacks and melee abilities against enemy Shapers will Constrict them for 4 seconds. Upon being Constricted 3 times, the target will be rooted for a short duration and cannot be affected by Constrict again for 6 seconds. Additionally, applying Constrict has a 0.75 second cooldown. The root lasts for 0.75 seconds as a ranged Shaper, and 1.5 seconds as a melee Shaper."
